Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.api

Interface RtiAmbassador

All Superinterfaces:
Interactable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MosaicRtiAmbassador
public interface RtiAmbassador extends Interactable
This interface is offered to each FederateAmbassador to allow communication to the RTI. Therefore, the RTI has to implement this interface.

    Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.api.Interactable

    triggerInteraction

  • Method Details

    • requestAdvanceTime

      void requestAdvanceTime(long time) throws IllegalValueException

      This method should be called by a federate ambassador to request advancing its simulation time. The RTI ambassador forwards this request to the time management and an event representing the request is stored. When the event is scheduled the federate ambassador is called by the RTI.

      This method delivers exactly the same result as requestAdvanceTime(time, 0, 0)

      Parameters:
      time - the simulation time in [ns]
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if an invalid time value has been passed

    • requestAdvanceTime

      void requestAdvanceTime(long time, long lookahead, byte priority) throws IllegalValueException
      This method should be called by a federate ambassador to request advancing its simulation time. The RTI ambassador forwards this request to the time management and an event representing the request is stored. When the event is scheduled the federate ambassador is called by the RTI.
      Parameters:
      time - the simulation time in [ns]
      lookahead - the time length in [ns] with which the federate guarantees to not request a time advance again
      priority - the priority of the event
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if an invalid time value has been passed

      long getNextEventTimestamp() throws IllegalValueException
      Provides the timestamp of them next scheduled event. [ns]
